commits.author: René Schwaiger
commits.body:
This commit adds CocoaDialog 3.0-beta7 to the bundle. This version of
the app should be identical to the one Matt Sephton (gingerbeardman)
uploaded [here][]. I only changed the name from `cocoaDialogNew.app` to
`CocoaDialog.app`.

This commit closes #31 and closes textmate/latex.tmbundle#181.

[here]: https://github.com/cocoadialog/cocoadialog/issues/108

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Change ERB trim mode from ‘%-<>’ to ‘%-’ to avoid warning

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Replace the ‘play’ shell command with a wrapper for ‘afplay’
commits.body: Our custom ‘play’ command was a subset of ‘afplay’ so we shouldn’t be breaking compatibility, and this avoids us having to keep the executable compiled for the latest architecture(s).

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Update the find_app shell command to be 64 bit

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Add source for the find_app shell command

commits.author: Ronald Wampler
commits.summary: Set views' background to use the default colors
commits.body: The background color was previously set to "Custom" in each case.

commits.author: Ronald Wampler
